example.eg: The lion's handler said that he had never been bitten or scratched.
Handlers are executed in response to a defined event.
example.egtrans: 信息处理机根据定义的事件执行。

example.eg: The handler of our reservations really screwed them up.
example.egtrans: 我们的预订管理人真的把事情搞砸了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 处理人, 负责管理的人

example.eg: The spy reported to her handler to receive her new assignment.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 间谍上级, 间谍管理者, 接头人

example.eg: The boxer's handler gave him advice between rounds.

dsense.name: handler
dsense.guideword: (person in charge of publicity) (政客、明星等)

example.eg: One of the politician's handlers gave him advice for the upcoming debate.
